name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities apply Ratfang Toxin to your target, stacking up to 5 times.
Use: Release all toxin stacks to deal 849,461 Nature damage, plus 97,081 per stack over 5 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 783,573 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
